channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From Thursday's NFL Honors
item.description: Matthew Stafford should've won MVP by a larger margin, and Bill Belichick's snub overshadowed the announcement of the Hall of Fame class.

item.title: What Are The 10 Best Super Bowl Commercials of All Time?
item.description: In some years, the Super Bowl commercials are as memorable as the game itself. Here are the 10 best Super Bowl commercials of all time.

item.title: Rams QB Matthew Stafford Wins Close MVP Vote, Will Return For 2026
item.description: Matthew Stafford has won his first MVP.

item.title: Is Shohei Ohtani Playing In The 2026 World Baseball Classic?
item.description: Here's everything we need to know about Shohei Ohtani's plans to play in the 2026 World Baseball Classic with Japan.

item.title: NFL Most Valuable Player: Complete List of Winners By Year
item.description: View the complete list of NFL MVPs by year, including every winner's position and team. Who has the most MVPs? Find out here!

item.title: Wrexham have Premier League in sight, just five years after Reynolds and Mac takeover
item.description: Feb. 9 marks five years since Ryan Reynolds and Rob Mac completed their Wrexham takeover and already, they're on track for promotion to the Premier Le...

item.title: Re-ranking the Premier League: Who's up? Who's down?
item.description: Man United are finally good, somehow Arsenal got even better, and what happened to Crystal Palace?

item.title: Who makes Mike Macdonald's defense so good? Seahawks to watch in Super Bowl LX
item.description: Devon Witherspoon, DeMarcus Lawrence and Nick Emmanwori are crucial players on Seattle's defense.

item.title: 12 teams that improved their 2026 CFP chances with their roster moves
item.description: With signing day closing many team's personnel moves, we look at the teams ready to make long postseason runs.
